name: 2 days 1 night Halong bay Tour
description:
With only 02 days, we also can arrange for you a join group tour that 
included visiting Halong bay and then you will have 01 night sleep at 
Monkey Island Resort. The next day, you have full morning to go 
swimming, go kayaking and join many activities on Monkey Island. After 
lunch time, we will arrange a package ticket for you to go back to 
Hanoi. You will arrive Hanoi before evening time comes.
